title: The fashion investments to make in your 30s, whether you have £50 or £1,000
text:
In our new six-part series, we outline the classic pieces worth buying at different ages. Previously we looked at fashion investments to make in your 20s. This week, we reveal why bras and belts are top of the list when making fashion investments in your 30s.

By the time we reach our 30s, we’ve built up a rotation of clothes that we can wear for work, to parties and at weekends. But the likelihood of those pieces being high-quality, wear-forever treasures is slim, because the spending power of a 20-something isn’t often that high.

Our thirty-something years are the decade when we can (hopefully) afford to step up our style game. We no longer have patience for cheap, itchy knitwear or ill-fitting...
description: In our new six-part series, we outline the classic pieces worth buying at different ages.
